pages.text: Say, "The Truth has come, and falsehood can neither originate anything nor regenerate it
Say, "If I should be misguided, it is only to my own detriment, but if I am guided, it is through what my Lord reveals to me. He is the All-Hearing, the Near
If only you could see when they are terrified, but there will be no escape, and they are seized from a place nearby
They will [then] say, "We do believe in it!" But how can they reach it from such a distant place
They had already denied the truth and were prone to guessing from afar about things beyond their perception
A barrier will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before, for they too were in hopeless doubt

[All] praise is due to God, the Programmer of the heavens and the earth. He made the angels messengers with wings, two, three and four [pairs]. He adds to His creation anyway He wills, for God has power over all things
Whatever mercy God grants to people, no one can prevent, whatever He withholds, no one can release, for He is the Almighty, the Wise
People, remember the favor of God upon you. Is there any creator other than God who provides for you from the heaven and earth? There is no God except Him, so what lies are you inventing
